professional_summary: Proven expertise in SQL Server administration, database development, and maintenance. Skilled in T-SQL programming, Windows/UNIX shell scripting, and various tools for database management.

key_responsibilities: Create and maintain SQL Server databases for optimal performance.
Develop and implement T-SQL solutions for data analysis and reporting.
Developed and optimized T-SQL queries for data integrity and query efficiency.
Monitored and resolved database issues to maintain system uptime.
Managed and maintained SQL Server databases across multiple environments.
Developed T-SQL scripts for data extraction and reporting purposes.
Performed database migrations and upgrades to support business growth.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Systems and Cyber Security
